channel.title: icb on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)
channel.description: Recent content in icb on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: ICB support added to Colloquy
item.description: Internet Citizen's Band (or ICB) is an ancient chat protocol, most likely the precursor of IRC. It is very limited — for example, you can only be logged into a single room — but I need to use it to communicate with a group of developers. It has a nice feature, though: bricks! Those who have used it know what I mean ;-) Up until recently, I used the ircII console client to access this chat network.
